attributes.action: Have a town allocated to keen gamers across the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to my attention that the amount of gamers in the UK is increasing on a daily basis by the thousands. Gaming is one of the most popular past-times on the globe right now, and so I believe that there should be a area of the country (E.g a town or a village) where these gamers can come together and group as one.

If there was to be a gaming town or village, it should have an Internet exchance in the centre, in order for everybody to have a high speed Internet connection.

The likes of PC Gaming, Console Gaming, and other popular games such as WarHammer could come together and form an amazing community.

Thank you for your time,

Liam Withers

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
